name: Milani Setting Spray + Primer, Make It Last Original - Natural Finish with Niacinamide for Hydration, Setting Spray for Makeup and Face Primer, 3-in-1 Prime + Hydrate + Set, 2.03 Fl. Oz
short_description: PRIME + CORRECT + SET: Make It Last Prime + Correct + Set Setting Spray preps your face, reduces the appearance of imperfections and then locks in for the long haul. You can enjoy up to 16 hours without a crease or smudge in sight. Spray before or after makeup application, or wear it alone for a captivating natural finish.

LONG-LASTING WEAR: This illuminating finishing spray and makeup primer delivers just the right dose of dewy to your complexion with a cooling, refreshing feeling, while locking in your makeup for up to 16 hours without creasing, smudging or fading!
VEGAN, CRUELTY-FREE BEAUTY: The vegan formula primes, hydrates, and illuminates your skin. Spray under or over makeup to set your look, or wear on its own for a healthy radiance all day long.
TIPS & TRICKS: Hold bottle 8-10 inches away from your face and spray in a zigzag formation. Do not spray directly into eyes.

WE ARE MILANI: Born in East LA, we've always been connected to the rich diversity of our neighborhood, because it’s a place that truly embodies the melting pot of Los Angeles. We're not inspired by couture and top models. Our passion is real people, living real lives. Beauty is for everyone. No matter who you are or where you come from, we're here to fuel your self-expression with makeup for every shade, attitude, and ethnicity. No judgment. No exceptions.

name: Morphe Continuous Setting Mist - Micro-Fine Makeup Setting Spray with a Natural Radiant Finish - Helps Makeup Resist Caking or Fading & Increases Wear of Foundation (2.8 fl oz)
short_description: Defend Your Artistry - Meet our #1 best-selling mist! Lock in your look all day with this micro-fine, vitamin-infused makeup setting spray. This must-have finishing spray sets and enhances liquid and powder makeup with a natural finish, while continuous air-powered technology ensures an even and controlled application every time.

Key Ingredients - This finishing spray for makeup is formulated with vitamin E, vitamin B5 and fruit extracts, as well as non-propellant bag-on-valve technology that allows for controlled, consistent application that's less harsh than traditional aerosol sprays.
Pairs Well With - Before applying the setting spray, set your liquid or cream makeup with our Bake & Set Soft Focus Setting Powder, under the eyes and in your t-zone for a flawless base.
How to Use - Hold the bottle 8 to 10 inches way from the face, close eyes and spray the setting spray evenly after makeup application.

Celebrate Your Inner Artist - Over the years, Morphe continues to break boundaries, fueled by iconic collaborations, internet-breaking launches, and an ever-increasing community. Today, Morphe exists to celebrate the inner artist in everyone by empowering beauty beginners and professionals alike with the tools and products to express themselves, unapologetically.

Lightweight and refreshing facial mist sets foundation, concealer, and other makeup products in place leaving makeup looking fresh all day
Makeup setting spray from a dermatologist-recommended brand, great for all skin types

product_description: Lock in your look with Neutrogena Healthy Skin Radiant Setting Spray. This weightless facial mist helps extend the wear of your makeup while promoting a radiant, healthy-looking glow. Formulat-ed with skin loving antioxidants and peptides, this makeup setting spray nourishes as it sets, help-ing your foundation and concealer stay in place. The breathable, lightweight formula goes on evenly and comfortably, leaving your skin feeling refreshed—not sticky or heavy. It provides lasting makeup hold with skincare benefits in one easy step. Hold the spray 6 to 8 inches away from the face and apply an even mist with eyes closed. Perfect for daily use or special occasions, this setting spray is the final touch in any makeup routine.

name: essence | Fix & Last 18H Long-Lasting Makeup Fixing Spray | All-Day Hold & Smudge Proof | Vegan & Cruelty Free
short_description: 18 HOUR HOLD: Say goodbye to midday touch-ups! This spray keeps your makeup looking fresh and flawless for a full 18 hours, so you can focus on living your day without worrying about your look.
PRO LEVEL PERFECTION: The upgraded spray head delivers an ultra-fine mist for even, mess-free application. No blotches, no overspray—just a perfectly set face every time.
SET IT & FORGET IT: Feel confident without feeling heavy! This lightweight spray dries quickly and comfortably, locking in your makeup while staying totally breathable and natural.
CLAIMS: Vegan & Cruelty Free. Free from parabens, phthalates, fragrance & microplastic particles. Made in Austria.
CRUELTY FREE: essence cosmetics is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty-free brand. We do not test any of our products on animals.

HOW TO: Start by gently shaking the bottle to mix the formula. Hold it 5-7 inches away from your face and close your eyes. Spray a few times, making sure to cover your entire makeup look evenly. Let the spray dry naturally for a few seconds, and you're ready to go with a fresh, long-lasting finish! For extra staying power, you can use it both before and after applying your makeup.
